Text.val: 12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
13.12.2010 SH SCR16039 Extended email input parameter from alpha 50 to 255
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
29.05.2008 GB SCR13675 Added new column PledgeByProxy
30.11.2007 SH SCR13176 Added PI.ADMNO (for range on CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO if >0)
11.04.2007 AK SCR12442 use CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE instead of CLNT_CONTRACT_END
19.10.2006 SH SR11908 Extended selection of CLNTand added new column 17 "TurnoverYearTot"

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWMAN) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWMAN) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWAUTO) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWAUTO) as decimal(15,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTIFACTCOMMSCHEDADD) as decimal(15,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':5' for fetch only
